mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ZIPCODE, MEMBER_ADDR, MEMBER_DEADDR, MEMBER_PHONE) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name}, #{member_email}, #{member_zipcode}, #{member_addr}, #{member_deaddr}, #{member_phone})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
